To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

::CyberShark::

    He transformed to flight mode and headed toward the ocean. He figured 
that she couldn't swim because anybody who has swam has loved the water and 
wants to again (CyberShark only knew swimming bots, and I am a swimmer on a 
team). He neared the ocean and transformed to Beast Mode. He let himself fall 
toward the ocean. When he hit it felt wonderful to be back. He swam around 
for a few minutes and then headed toward shore.
    Nearing the shore he transformed back to robot mode so he wouldn't get 
beached. He walked out of the water and sat on the beach. He looked at his 
tail/hand, it was useless for swimming in robot mode. But he could manage to 
teach someone.

(In reality I haven't taught anyone how to swim, I've just helped, so bear 
with me.)
